nodes.text: Mission to explore a tomb on Athiss
A group of lore seekers went to Athiss to explore a tomb they mistakenly believed was of a Jedi. They arrive at the Far Orbit Resort and Lodge before journeying to the ruins.
At the tomb they meet The Mad Hermit as well as a group of Sithspawn.
In the tomb they encountered a manifestation of the dark side which took the image of the Sith Lord.
In the end, the manifestation vanishes, along with the Sithspawn, allowing the to explore a cave of Kyber crystals.
The mission appears in the Lost Knowledge adventure in Fantasy Flight Games' 2014 Star Wars: Force and Destiny Beta.
